title: "Webuild wins €1.26bn contract to build self-driving highways"
excerpt: "A consortium led by Italian builder Webuild has won a €1.26bn contract to design and build two sections of the Pedemontana Lombarda Highway in northern Italy, which will have technology to facilitate self-driving vehicles."
